meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>road</kanji> where you're <kanji>astray</kanji> is a road that goes all around in different ways, tricking you and making you lost. This is a <vocabulary>maze</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
